content:
# I have successfully harvested 10 units of coal, bringing my inventory to:
# - 1 stone furnace
# - 12 wood
# - 10 coal

# Now that I have coal, I can place the stone furnace down and use it to smelt resources. 
# I will place the stone furnace in a suitable location and then add coal as fuel.

place_entity(Prototype.StoneFurnace, position=(0, 0))  # Place the stone furnace at coordinates (0, 0)
add_fuel(Prototype.StoneFurnace, 'coal', quantity=5)  # Add 5 coal to the stone furnace as fuel
print(f"Stone furnace placed and fueled. Current inventory: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check the inventory again.
